original_title: A Black Bull for My Hotwife
overview: These horny hotwives are ready for the ultimate spice...a BBC! In all brand new scenes, watch Sydney Cole, Alexa Grace, Ella Nova and Kate England take a huge dosage of black bull to cure their interracial fevers!
title: A Black Bull for My Hotwife
